ModMetaData.name: [BLD] Quantum Cooling Redux
ModMetaData.author: Alaestor
ModMetaData.description:
Go tell Thermodynamics to screw off!
Using quantum mechanics; you can discover how to reduce entropy without displacing it.
Quantum Cooling technology allows for exhaustless cooling. Quantum Heating technology allows for highly efficient heating.
It can be used to reach extremely low or high temperatures; but is relatively expensive and consumes a lot of power.
| Unofficial/Redux version maintained by Poet |
